title.rendered: Canada Express Entry Latest Draw August 2022

Share Tweet Share Pin
[vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][nectar_btn size=”large” open_new_tab=”true” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” text=”LATEST EXPRESS ENTRY DRAW OCTOBER 2022″ url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/news/canada-express-entry-latest-draw-october-26-2022/”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]Canada’s Latest Express Entry Draw Round #230 results were announced on August 31, 2022. In this draw, IRCC invited 2,750 candidates to apply for permanent residence, breaking the trend of 250 invitations increment. The cut-off score for the latest all-program Express Entry draw was 516.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Canada Latest Express Entry Draw Results: August 3, 2022

  • Express Entry Round: #228
  • Draw date: August 3, 2022
  • CRS score cut-off:  533
  • No. of candidates invited:  2000
  • Tie-breaking rule: January 06, 2022
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Canada Latest Express Entry Draw Results: August 17, 2022

  • Express Entry Round: #229
  • Draw date: August 17, 2022
  • CRS score cut-off:  525
  • No. of candidates invited:  2,250
  • Tie-breaking rule: December 28, 2021
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Canada Latest Express Entry Draw Results: August 31, 2022

  • Express Entry Round: #230
  • Draw date: August 31, 2022
  • CRS score cut-off: 516
  • No. of candidates invited: 2,750
  • Tie-breaking rule: April 16, 2022
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”When Will CRS Cut-Off Go Down?” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1659442968332{padding-top: 40px !important;}” el_id=”apply-for-visitor-visa”][vc_column_text]The CRS Scores are up in the sky since the Express Entry Draws resumed on July 6, 2022. Although these numbers shall gradually decrease as promised by the Canadian Government. Before Covid-19, Express Entry draws invited 3,000 to 50,000 candidates per draw.

The high cut-off is largely due to the build-up of competitive candidates in the Express Entry pool over these years.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” Apply for Express Entry?” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”none” text=”Contact our experts” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/contact-us/” margin_top=”20px” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Express Entry September 14, 2022 Predictions” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1662014668200{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]We don’t have much data on how many people can be added to the pool. For the sake of calculation let’s take an average of no. of candidates added to the pool in all the draws that happened so far.

So there should be 548 candidates added with a 600+ CRS score, and 955 candidates will be added in the 501-600 range.

Please refer to the table below for the average no. of Candidates to be added before the Next Express Entry Draw.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” !important;}”][vc_column_text]Hundreds of Express Entry applicants received assistance from our experts in obtaining permanent residency in Canada. You can contact our professionals here. Keshav Sharma is an experienced Regulated Canadian Immigration Consultant in Canada. Our team will assist you in obtaining permanent residency throughout the entire immigration process.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-4-percent” column_padding_tablet=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”left-right” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”4/12″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJtbC1mb3JtLWVtYmVkJTIyJTBBJTIwJTIwZGF0YS1hY2NvdW50JTNEJTIyMzgxOTE0NiUzQWIyYzNtMHIxYzklMjIlMEElMjAlMjBkYXRhLWZvcm0lM0QlMjI1NDY1NDI2JTNBdTJ4Mms4JTIyJTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNF[/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Trending Stories” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1644853159092{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][recent_posts style=”list_featured_first_row” columns=”1″ category=”all” order=”DESC” orderby=”date” image_loading=”default” blog_remove_post_date=”true” blog_remove_post_author=”true” blog_remove_post_comment_number=”true” blog_remove_post_nectar_love=”true” posts_per_page=”5″ post_offset=”1″][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: The Express Entry Latest Draw was held on August 3, 2022. Canada invited 2,000 candidates. The cut-off score was also reduced by 9 points (533).
